channel.title: CVE Feed for redhat-certification -- rhcertstore.py
channel.description: The latest CVEs for redhat-certification -- rhcertstore.py

item.title: CVE-2018-10870|2024-08-05T07:46:47.511Z -- redhat-certification -- rhcertstore.py
item.description: redhat-certification does not properly sanitize paths in rhcertStore.py:__saveResultsFile. A remote attacker could use this flaw to overwrite any file, potentially gaining remote code execution.
